## Source: amazon-inspector (1bb6d9d88b5364464913578a099da2b1259bed01c770b78797f9c7f97dd9ba67)
The package paysera-checkout-modal was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (d82354334d472acf6da73f43e8ac61496f35a580a5cf13d3ff3730f734d8585e)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'paysera-checkout-modal' @ 99.9.9 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
